action.text: Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Tester. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 145.

bill.summary:
Comprehensive and Overdue Support for Troops of War Act of 2021 or the COST of War Act of 2021
This bill addresses health care and the presumption of service-connection for certain conditions in veterans who were exposed to toxic substances during service in the Armed Forces.
